en.welcome-nav:
Welcome to the newly redesigned Customer Portal

We've refined our navigation to make it easier to find things in the Portal
en.products: Products & Services is the single place to find everything you need about your product. Certification, Product documentation and content, and Support Policies can all be found from here.
en.tools: Tools is a new place for everything Red Hat Support develops to make your life easier. Red Hat Access Labs and Plug-in, and additional tools can now all be found here.
en.security: Everything Security related can be found here including the CVE database, information on the Red Hat Product Security team, and relevant policy information.
en.community: Community is now the place for our two-way interactions! Discussions, Blogs, Events, and feedback are now available from here.
en.top-nav: We've placed important utilities at the top of the Customer Portal. Now, you're only one click away any time from managing your subscriptions, downloads, or support cases.
en.utility-nav: You can search, login, and change your language from this global bar at any time!
en.quick-links: We've also provided some key tasks from here to jump right into the tasks that matter the most to you.
en.whats-new: See what's new in the Customer Portal including important announcements, new labs, product releases, and more.
